events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday evening. My vehicle has severe front-end damage and I need to file a claim immediately.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the reported car collision involving front-end damage.
An agent has been assigned to your case and will guide you through the next steps for the vehicle claim process.
Your claim has been officially acknowledged and is now under review by our claims department.
Please provide photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and your driverâ€™s license for further processing.
All requested documents including photos and reports have been submitted for your auto accident claim.
Our investigation team has started assessing the details of the vehicle collision to validate the claim.
The investigation into your car accident claim has been completed with all facts verified and documented.
A settlement offer based on the repair estimates and coverage has been proposed for your approval.
Customer has reviewed the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the offered resolution.
Your car accident claim has been approved following the acceptance of the settlement proposal.
The approved payment for vehicle repairs has been issued and should reflect in your bank account shortly.
Your auto accident insurance claim has now been officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
